title: It is 8:30 and the street is beginning to come to life.  The fruit peddler who keeps his fruits in the garage has arranged his tray.  On the left Connie Damiani is on her way to her job at Plymouth Toy Co.
dimensions: sheet (trimmed to image): 26.2 x 34.2 cm (10 5/16 x 13 7/16 in.)
creditline: Robert Frank Collection, Gift of Robert Frank
